title: Never Again
description: Mickie Jeffries semi-retired burglar and window cleaner finds the body of a brutally slain woman and is soon labelled as the prime suspect by the News Media and Police. DCI Mark Simpson's team unravel a complex web of murder mystery and kidnap involving International Conspiracies and hired South African killers. Devious and self-serving Mickie however continues to play a major part in this gritty British Police crime thriller which sees investigative journalism and politics dramatically collide.
author: Alex Le Val
